name: Re:venue
description:
The best leadership simulation of this Autumn! 👌👌💯💯💯 You are the chosen leader ⭐.  With you tomorrow will be better. Your leadership will guarantee us a better future. Your innovative ways will help us reach our goals. Lead your subordinates 👷‍♂️ with true skill and compassion 🥕. Motivation is the key 🔑 to success.

This game was made for TiTe Gamejam IX. It is held two times a year for students by students at XAMK, Kotka Campus.

The theme for the jam was the following image:

The game is tested to work with Oculus Rift. It should work with HTC Vive and other VR headsets as well. Just remember to have SteamVR open to enable controls.

The game was programmed by Teemu Turku and Janessa Aulén. A lot of assets were used and the list for credits can be found as a .pdf along with the downloadable game files.
